name: Feather
summary: Feather is a serene game about exploration and immersion in a beautiful landscape. Become a bird, fly around and lose yourself in zen-like flow whilst listening to the soothing ambient soundtrack.
info:
• 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV, SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2019年4月6日
  • 制作: Samurai Punk
  • 发行: Samurai Punk
